scripts.install:all: npm --prefix services/clientes install && npm --prefix services/contas install && npm --prefix services/transacoes install && npm --prefix gateway install
scripts.build:all: npm --prefix services/clientes run build && npm --prefix services/contas run build && npm --prefix services/transacoes run build && npm --prefix gateway run build
scripts.migrate:all: cd services/clientes && npx prisma migrate dev --name init --skip-seed --schema prisma/schema.prisma && cd ../../services/contas && npx prisma migrate dev --name init --skip-seed --schema prisma/schema.prisma && cd ../../services/transacoes && npx prisma migrate dev --name init --skip-seed --schema prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.seed:all: cd services/clientes && npx prisma db seed --schema prisma/schema.prisma && cd ../../services/contas && npx prisma db seed --schema prisma/schema.prisma && cd ../../services/transacoes && npx prisma db seed --schema prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.setup:all: npm run install:all && npm run build:all && npm run migrate:all && npm run seed:all
scripts.start:pm2: npm run setup:all && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js
